overview: Mom's Got A Meeting: Cherie's a stepmom who's all business. She wants to prepare for her big meeting tomorrow, but she can hear stepson Kyle watching porn and it's very distracting! At her wit's end, the workaholic finally walks in, shuts the porn off, and sucks her stepson's dick as she's on the phone with a colleague. She ignores his pussy-eating as she's practicing her speech, and types finishing edits on her laptop as they're fucking. She may want to shut her stepson up, but she'll have to keep working while she's doing it.
title: Cougar Sightings 4
